AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wild Fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Like many LittleFairies, [PAWN_nameDef] has been trained in combat since he was born. They are fearsome fighters, tearing flesh with their swords and piercing bone with their bows.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nursery Manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in control of the nursery to increase the Little Fairies. If there was anything wrong with the nursery, she took care of the nursery.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wild Healer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was LittleFairy's doctor, healing his friends when they were injured. When it was determined that they could not be saved, they would send the injured to the butcher for cannibalism.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wild Butcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for butchering and cooking the meat of the prey hunted by the herd. It is a necessary role in order to feed the hunger of his companions.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artificially Born
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has LittleFairy born in aquaculture by a different species.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: LittleFairy Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a LittleFairy born from an interracial marriage.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: LittleFairy Warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Raised as a warrior, [PAWN_nameDef] went through many battles. After completing her role, she traveled aimlessly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: LittleFairy Shooter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Raised as a shooter, [PAWN_nameDef] went through many battles. After completing her role, she traveled aimlessly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: LittleFairy Servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: trained to serve other species, [PAWN_nameDef] performed many chores. However, he was separated from her master by a spaceship accident.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: LittleFairy Diplomat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The charming [PAWN_nameDef] has solved many problems as a diplomat. However, a spaceship accident caused her to be separated from her master.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: LittleFairy Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Educated for medicine, [PAWN_nameDef] has done a lot of healing in the colony. However, an accident caused the colony to collapse and she escaped.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: LittleFairy Farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Educated for medicine, [PAWN_nameDef] was growing many crops in the colony. However, an accident caused the colony to collapse and she escaped.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Emergency Food
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born in a cannibalistic colony, [PAWN_nameDef] was kept as food. However, when the colony collapsed due to conflict, she was able to escape her fate as food.
